name: Roller Coaster Sim Tycoon 2k18
description:
In roller coaster ride game, you are driving a crazy roller coaster train simulator on real challenging trails to pick and drop the passengers across the theme park. Use the throttle stick to stop at the roller coaster rail stations and then board the passenger on your crazy rollercoaster simulator. Pass through the multiple roller coaster stations and enjoy the longest trip of your life. Enjoy the astonishing graphics of city amusement park with detailed textures and double your fun adventure in no time. This crazy ride game will take you to the sky highs while giving you the feel of real life roller coasters. Enjoy riding the multiple new and modern roller coasters simulators with perfect controls and realistic physics based simulation. Experience the unique ride of floorless roller coasters and whizz through the multiple twisty and sharp turn and tunnels.
Download Now.
